SELECT t_goods.goods_id, t_goods.goods_code, t_goods.goods_name, inventory_quantity, last_purchasing_price, min_num, t_goods.goods_model, goods_producer, purchasing_price, remarks, selling_price, state, t_goods.goods_unit, t_goods.goods_type_id, goods_type_name, (t_sale_list_goods.goods_num - t_customer_return_list_goods.goods_num) sale_total FROM t_goods INNER JOIN t_goods_type ON t_goods.goods_type_id = t_goods_type.goods_type_id LEFT JOIN t_sale_list_goods ON t_goods.goods_id = t_sale_list_goods.goods_id LEFT JOIN t_customer_return_list_goods ON t_goods.goods_id = t_customer_return_list_goods.goods_id
and (t_goods.goods_code = #{codeOrName} or t_goods.goods_name like "%"#{codeOrName}"%")
and (t_goods.goods_type_id = #{goodsTypeId})
GROUP BY t_goods.goods_code ORDER BY goods_code LIMIT #{page}, #{rows}
